message.entry: Sample rate has to be positive number less than or equal to {0} in Hz or 'high', 'medium' or 'low'.
This sensor is not available on your device.
Cannot start data transfer - no sensors are enabled.\nPlease enable at least one sensor.
MATLAB Mobile is not connected to this MATLAB session.
Remote control of the sensors is turned off on the device.\nPlease go to the MATLAB Mobile Settings and turn it on.
The assigned value should be a logical.
mobiledev reached its maximum log size.
mobiledev object already exists. Clear the existing instance before creating a new one.
Remote control of the sensors is not allowed when "Log" option is selected on the device.\nSwitch device to "Stream To MATLAB" option in MATLAB Mobile.
